Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Best Western Hotel Balmoral, you'll be centrally located in Saint-Malo, convenient to Port of Saint-Malo and St. Malo Citadel. This hotel is within close proximity of Saint-Malo Hospital and Espace Duguay-Trouin.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 77 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters and Frette Italian sheets. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Saint-Malo? This hotel has 120 square feet (11 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers.

With a stay at Best Western Hotel Balmoral, you'll be centrally located in Saint-Malo, convenient to Port of Saint-Malo and St. Malo Citadel. This hotel is within close proximity of Saint-Malo Hospital and Espace Duguay-Trouin.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Port of Saint-Malo - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Saint-Malo Hospital - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Espace Duguay-Trouin - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Le Grand Large - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Casino Barriere Saint-Malo - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Porte Saint Vincent - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
St. Malo Citadel - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Musee de la Ville - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
St. Vincent Cathedral - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Fort National - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Grande Plage - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Saint-Malo Ferry Port - 1.6 km / 1 mi
St. Malo Beach - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Solidor Tower - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Grand Be - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
Dinard (DNR-Dinard - Pleurtuit - Saint-Malo) - 8.1 km / 5 mi
Rennes (RNS-Saint-Jacques) - 67.5 km / 42 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Hotel Balmoral is Rennes (RNS-Saint-Jacques).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
